content: Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message indicating that the room index has been exported and saved to a specific location. It is typically displayed in a UI element related to file management or history, such as a button label or dialog title. The "sectionName" variable refers to the name of the "My Files" section.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تم حفظ تصدير فهرس الغرفة في {{sectionName}}' is a bit literal and not the most natural way to express 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}' in Arabic.  'تم حفظ' (has been saved) is a passive construction that isn't ideal here. A more active and concise phrasing would improve clarity.
The Arabic text includes a zero-width space ( ) after 'تصدير'. This is an artifact of the text processing and should be removed.

The translation "Otaq indeksinin ixracı {{sectionName}} bölməsində qeyd edildi" literally translates to 'The export of the room index was noted in the {{sectionName}} section.' This doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'saved to'. It implies something was observed, not that it was stored.
There's a space before the section name placeholder {{sectionName}} in the translated text. This might look awkward depending on the UI.

The translation 'Експорт на индекса на стаята е запазен в {{sectionName}}' is not the most natural or accurate translation. 'Експорт' is correct for Export, but the rest implies the export *was saved*, not that the location of the export is what's important. The intention is to say something like 'The room index export location is {{sectionName}}'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Експортът на индекса на стаята се намира в {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'е' after 'запазен' is slightly awkward. While not grammatically incorrect, it's not the most elegant phrasing. It reads better without it.
The Czech translation contains a non-breaking space ( ) after "uložen". This might cause display issues and is generally unnecessary.

The translation 'Der Export des Raumindex wird in {{sectionName}} gespeichert' implies a future action ('will be saved'). The original English implies the export *is* saved to the specified location. A more accurate translation would convey a present state.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Der Export des Raumindex ist in {{sectionName}} gespeichert.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a non-breaking space ( ) instead of a regular space. This can cause display issues.

The English content implies a completed action ('saved to'). The Spanish translation uses the preterite tense ('se ha guardado'), suggesting a single, completed action. A better translation might use a present perfect tense to imply a state of being saved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: La exportación del índice de salas está guardada en {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Huoneen indeksi vietiin {{sectionName}}-osioon' while technically correct, doesn't fully convey the nuance of 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}'.  'Export' suggests a direct action taken, whereas the translation implies a passive occurrence ('was exported to'). A more accurate translation would emphasize the action of exporting.
The use of a non-breaking space (' ') is unusual and may not be consistent with Finnish style guides. It's best to use a regular space.
The phrase 'sauvegardé dans' is grammatically awkward in this context. A more natural phrasing would be 'enregistré dans' or simply 'dans'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Exportation de l'index de la salle enregistré dans {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Սենյակի ինդեքսի արտահանումը պահված է {{sectionName}}' literally translates to 'The export of the room index is saved to {{sectionName}}'. This is not the most natural or accurate way to express the meaning of 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}'. It implies that the export *is* saved, rather than that the location where the export is saved is {{sectionName}}.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Սենյակի ինդեքսի արտահանումը կատարվում է {{sectionName}} (Senyaki indexi arhanumy katarumy e {{sectionName}} - The export of the room index is done to {{sectionName}}) or Սենյակի ինդեքսի արտահանումի վայրը՝ {{sectionName}} (Senyaki indexi arhanumi vayry e {{sectionName}} - The location of the room index export is {{sectionName}}).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Export of the room index' is better translated as 'Esportazione dell'indice della stanza'. The current translation 'L’indice della stanza è stato esportato' is passive and less direct.
While 'è stato salvato' is grammatically correct, it's a little wordy and less natural than a more direct equivalent.

The English phrase "Export of the room index saved to" doesn't perfectly align with the Japanese translation "ルームインデックスのエクスポートが {{sectionName}} に保存されました". A more accurate translation would emphasize the *destination* of the export, rather than framing it as a saving action. The implication of 'saved' doesn't quite match the English intention of an export.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ルームインデックスのエクスポート先は {{sectionName}} です

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '채팅방 인덱스 내보내기가 (으)로 저장됨' is a bit awkward. The '(으)로' implies a tool or method being used for saving, which isn't clear from the English 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}'. It should be more directly '저장됨'.
While technically correct, using '에' instead of '(으)로' aligns better with standard Korean sentence structure when indicating a location where something is saved.

The phrase "ການສົ່ງອອກດອກສໍານວນຫ້ອງ" is a bit awkward. While technically correct, it can be improved for naturalness. "ດອກສໍານວນຫ້ອງ" literally means "room index flower". A more natural translation would emphasize the 'saving' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການບັນທຶກການສົ່ງອອກດອກສໍານວນຫ້ອງ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation preserves the "{{sectionName}}" placeholder, which is correct, but consider ensuring consistency in placeholder formatting across all translations.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed, just maintain consistency.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Telpas indeksa eksports saglabāts {{sectionName}}" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}". It literally translates to "Room index export saved {{sectionName}}" which implies the export itself was saved, not where it was saved. A more accurate translation would indicate the destination of the export.
While technically correct, the sentence structure feels a little awkward in Latvian. It could benefit from a slight rephrasing for better flow.
The spacing around 'in' is inconsistent. There's a non-breaking space before it.

The translation 'Eksport indeksu pokoju zapisany w {{sectionName}}' is a passive voice construction which doesn't directly translate the active voice of the English original 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}'.  A more accurate translation would emphasize the action of exporting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Eksport indeksu pokoju został zapisany w {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of a non-breaking space (nbsp) before 'w' looks odd and may not be the intended formatting. It's likely a result of the translation process.

The translation 'Fișierul cu index de săli exportat a fost salvat în secțiunea {{sectionName}}' is a bit too literal and verbose. It translates 'Export of the room index saved to...' which is best conveyed more simply.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Indexul sălilor a fost exportat în secțiunea {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The passive voice 'a fost salvat' (was saved) makes the sentence slightly clunky. A more active construction improves readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Indexul sălilor a fost exportat în secțiunea {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Экспорт индекса комнаты сохранен в {{sectionName}}' literally translates to 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}'. However, a more natural Russian phrasing would be 'Индекс комнаты экспортирован в {{sectionName}}' or 'Экспорт индекса комнаты расположен в {{sectionName}}'. The current translation sounds awkward.

The translation 'අංශයේ කාමර දර්ශකය සුරක්ෂිතව අපනයනය කරනු ලැබුවේ {{sectionName}} වෙත.' is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'අංශයේ කාමර දර්ශකය {{sectionName}} වෙත සුරක්ෂිතව අපනයනය කරන ලදී' is a better phrasing. The passive voice in Sinhala feels less smooth.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අංශයේ කාමර දර්ශකය {{sectionName}} වෙත සුරක්ෂිතව අපනයනය කරන ලදී.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'වෙත' at the end of the sentence can feel slightly awkward in this context. While grammatically correct, it suggests a destination rather than a place where something is saved. 'අංශයේ කාමර දර්ශකය {{sectionName}} වෙත' might imply the exported room index *goes* to that location. Consider revising for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අංශයේ කාමර දර්ශකය {{sectionName}} තුළ සුරක්ෂිතව අපනයනය කරන ලදී

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation contains a non-breaking space ( ) which might cause layout issues. It should be a regular space.

While technically correct, 'Export indexu miestnosti' is somewhat awkward. A more natural translation might use 'výpis indexu miestnosti'. 'Index' is often used as a loanword in Slovak, but the more descriptive term might be preferred for clarity.
The use of a non-breaking space ( ) is unusual and potentially unnecessary. Consider using a regular space.

The term 'Извоз' (Izvoz) translates to 'Export' but in this context, a more natural Serbian (Cyrillic) word would be 'Сачувана' (Sačuvana) meaning 'saved'. 'Izvoz' implies an active export process, while the English implies a saved file or location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Сачуван индекс собе је сачуван у {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, using 'је сачуван' twice is a bit redundant.  A more fluent phrasing is possible.

The translation 'Izvoz indeksa sobe je sačuvan u {{sectionName}}' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}'. A better phrasing would emphasize the location of the export.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izvoz indeksa sobe smešten je u {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sačuvan' implies something was preserved, which isn't the primary meaning of 'saved' in the context of an export. 'Smešten' (located) is a more accurate term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider the suggestion above, which replaces 'sačuvan' with 'smešten'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'Oda indeksi dışa aktarımı {{sectionName}} bölümüne kaydedildi' implies that the export *is saved* to the section, rather than that it's located there. The English 'Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}' means the export is *found* in that location.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Oda indeksi dışa aktarımı {{sectionName}} bölümünde bulundu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation uses a space before the section name variable {{sectionName}}. It might be better to align it with the English spacing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Oda indeksi dışa aktarımı {{sectionName}} bölümüne kaydedildi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Ukrainian translation uses a non-breaking space ( ) instead of a regular space.

The translation "Đã lưu xuất chỉ mục phòng vào {{sectionName}}" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Export of the room index saved to {{sectionName}}". "Xuất" implies an export action, but the original English emphasizes that the room index has been *saved*.  A more accurate rendering would convey that the room index was saved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã lưu chỉ mục phòng vào {{sectionName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The space before '{{sectionName}}' looks a little awkward in Vietnamese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã lưu chỉ mục phòng vào {{sectionName}}
